H0.text: Several years is the most likely time taken for the formation of the Grand Canyon.

H1.text: Hundreds of years is the most likely duration for the formation of the Grand Canyon.

H2.text: The formation of the Grand Canyon has most likely taken thousands of years.

H3.text: Millions of years is the most likely duration for the formation of the Grand Canyon.

A4.text: The Colorado River established its course through the area about 5 to 6 million years ago.

A5.text: The great depth of the Grand Canyon can be attributed to 5,000â€“10,000 feet of uplift of the Colorado Plateau starting about 65 million years ago.
